name: Family care Trust
briefDescription: Family Care has been working with the hearing impaired since its inception. About 1,000 deaf are reached through the regular weekly classes teaching English, personality development and character building and computer knowledge. Deaf youth in Coimbatore, Erode, Madurai, Mysore and Chennai are helped through seminars and workshops held at different intervals during the year. The International Week for the deaf programmes are the highlights of the yearly projects. Many events and programmes are organized and conducted for children from deaf schools through the months of August – October, commemorating the International Day of the deaf, thereby giving them opportunities to have fun and visit places and experience events that they normally do n
